Submodules¶

vlearn.roa.object_detection module¶

class vlearn.roa.object_detection.ObjDet(vpath, label_pbtxt, inf_graph)¶

Bases: vlearn.vid_reader.VReader

get_roa(pocs, poce, skip=1)¶

Returns a numpy array with same resolution as video. Each element in this array is normalized score that it can be considered as active.

Parameters

  • pocs (int) – Starting poc

  • poce (int) – Ending poc. Value of -1 implies we use all frames.

  • skip (int) – Frames to skip. By default it is 1.

vlearn.roa.optical_flow module¶

class vlearn.roa.optical_flow.OptFlw(vpath, method='Farneback')¶

Bases: vlearn.vid_reader.VReader

get_mag_map_frms(frm0, frm1)¶

Computes optical flow magnitude map for between two frames. :param frm0: Video frame 0 :type frm0: ndarray :param frm1: Video frame 1 :type frm1: ndarray

Note

frm1 plays later than frm0. That means poc(frm0) < poc(frm1)

get_nmag_map_vid(pocs, poce)¶

Returns a numpy array with same resolution as video. Each element in this array is normalized optical flow magnitude.

Parameters

  • pocs (int) – Starting poc

  • poce (int) – Ending poc. Value of -1 implies we use all frames.

get_mag_map_frms(frm0, frm1)¶

Computes optical flow magnitude map for between two frames. :param frm0: Video frame 0 :type frm0: ndarray :param frm1: Video frame 1 :type frm1: ndarray

Note

frm1 plays later than frm0. That means poc(frm0) < poc(frm1)

get_nmag_map_vid(pocs, poce)¶

Returns a numpy array with same resolution as video. Each element in this array is normalized optical flow magnitude.

Parameters

  • pocs (int) – Starting poc

  • poce (int) – Ending poc. Value of -1 implies we use all frames.

class vlearn.roa.ObjDet(vpath, label_pbtxt, inf_graph)¶

Bases: vlearn.vid_reader.VReader

get_roa(pocs, poce, skip=1)¶

Returns a numpy array with same resolution as video. Each element in this array is normalized score that it can be considered as active.

Parameters

  • pocs (int) – Starting poc

  • poce (int) – Ending poc. Value of -1 implies we use all frames.

  • skip (int) – Frames to skip. By default it is 1.
